Redundancy.description: The common redundancy definition and structure used in other Redfish schemas.
Redundancy.longDescription: This object represents the redundancy element property.

RedundantGroup.description: The redundancy information for the devices in a redundancy group.
RedundantGroup.longDescription: This type shall contain redundancy information for the set of devices in this redundancy group.

title: #Redundancy
